member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.SF2.SPI.SendData(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Data is sent across the SPI.
member.returns: Returns true if a detection was found, false if no detection was found.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.SF2.SPI.ReceiveData(System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Data is received across the SPI.
member.returns: Returns true if a detection was found, false if no detection was found.
